definitions.definition: A hallucinogenic alkaloid , C 12 H 15 N 2 O·H 2 PO 3 , present in several species of Central American mushroom and producing effects similar to LSD . The prodrug of psilocin .

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) A hallucinogenic alkaloid , C 12 H 15 N 2 O·H 2 PO 3 , present in several species of Central American mushroom and producing effects similar to LSD . The prodrug of psilocin .
